title: Leaver Buster- False Accusations
body:
I dont know about you guys, but i had my game crash, to find out to download 500mb of crap today, forcing me out of a ranked game. For this i got a considerable 20 minute ban before every game i play (for 5 games). This often resets, amounting to up to 1 hour. Could rito please fix this resetting error, and have an appeal section. 

I believe that this is an unfair accusation, due to the faulty software, it fails me and punishes me!

replies.body: Unfortunately there is no way for the game to detect whether you were kicked out or left on purpose.

Then maybe Riot could put a little effort into the OCE server and stop things like this happening.
Riot: 'Nahh %%%% that, it's funny to make make people deal with %%%% they never had to on different servers'
Beta testing op. The PBE is based in NA, no? So there's no live testing for OCE.
